remarks: Lemma for ~ paddass .  Show ` s =/= z ` by contradiction.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Jan-2012.)
statement:
paddasslem.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
paddasslem.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
paddasslem.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
paddasslem5 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ r e. A /\ ( x e. A /\ y e. A /\ z e. A ) ) /\ ( -. r .<_ ( x .\/ y ) /\ r .<_ ( y .\/ z ) /\ s .<_ ( x .\/ y ) ) ) -> s =/= z ) $.
